Compare two agents side-by-side
Get agents ranked by calibration score

Get list of all debates for the authenticated user.

**Rate Limit:** 60 requests per minute (free), 300/min (pro), 1000/min (enterprise)

**Pagination:** Use `limit` and `offset` for pagination. Maximum 100 items per request.

**Filtering:** Results are filtered to debates owned by or shared with the authenticated user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of debates to return

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filter debates created after this timestamp

429.description: Too many requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description:
Start a new multi-agent debate on a given topic.

**Rate Limit:** 10 debates per day (free), 100/day (pro), unlimited (enterprise)

**Concurrent Limit:** 1 concurrent debate (free), 5 (pro), 20 (enterprise)

**Authentication:** Required. The debate will be owned by the authenticated user.

**WebSocket:** After creation, connect to the returned `websocket_url` to stream real-time debate progress.

code.description: Machine-readable error code for programmatic handling

trace_id.description: Unique request ID for debugging and support

field.description: Name of the field that caused the error (for validation errors)

resource_type.description: Type of resource involved in the error

resource_id.description: ID of the resource involved in the error

limit.description: The limit that was exceeded (for quota/rate errors)

retry_after.description: Seconds to wait before retrying (for rate limit errors)

upgrade_url.description: URL to upgrade plan (for quota errors)

DebateCreateRequest.description: Request body for creating a new debate

task.description: The topic or question for the debate
task.example: Should we adopt microservices architecture for our e-commerce platform?

question.description: Alias for task (deprecated, use task instead)

agents.description: List of agent names to participate. If empty, auto_select is used.

context.example: We have 1M daily active users and need 99.9% uptime.

auto_select.description: Automatically select optimal agents based on topic

use_trending.description: Include trending context from news/social media

example.task: Should we adopt microservices architecture for our e-commerce platform?
example.context: We have 1M daily active users and need 99.9% uptime.

DebateCreateResponse.description: Response when a debate is successfully created

success.description: Whether the debate was created successfully

debate_id.description: Unique identifier for the created debate

websocket_url.description: WebSocket URL to stream debate progress

error.description: Error message if success is false

DecisionReceipt.description: A decision receipt documenting a gauntlet outcome

PatternTemplate.description: A workflow pattern template (e.g., Hive Mind, MapReduce)

CheckpointMetadata.description: Metadata for a debate or workflow checkpoint

RestoreResult.description: Result of a checkpoint restore operation

DecisionExplanation.description: Full explanation of a debate decision

bearerAuth.description: API token authentication. Set via ARAGORA_API_TOKEN environment variable.
